title: Production of Activist Media
description: In this course, we ask what techniques, strategies, and platforms we might engage to present messages in an impactful and ethical way. We engage with different media forms each quarter, maintaining an emphasis on production and documentary storytelling. The aim of this class is to demystify the idea of a “media activist” by guiding students through the development of their own media activism. Prerequisites: COMM 10 and COMM 101.
